<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/products"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



商品一覧を取得します。フィルタリング、ソート、ページネーションが可能です。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"ページ番号（1から始まる）","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1},"example":1},{"name":"pageSize","in":"query","description":"1ページあたりのアイテム数","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":20},"example":20},{"name":"sort","in":"query","description":"ソート順を指定（カンマ区切りで複数指定可能）\n\nフォーマット: `field:order`\n- order: `asc` (昇順) または `desc` (降順)\n\n例:\n- `createdAt:desc` - 作成日時の降順\n- `price:asc,name:asc` - 価格の昇順、次に名前の昇順\n","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"createdAt:desc"},{"name":"category","in":"query","description":"カテゴリでフィルタ","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"アウター"},{"name":"brand","in":"query","description":"ブランドでフィルタ","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Premium Fashion"},{"name":"minPrice","in":"query","description":"最低価格","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number","format":"decimal"},"example":10000},{"name":"maxPrice","in":"query","description":"最高価格","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number","format":"decimal"},"example":50000}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
